Yes, there are many other steps that small businesses can take to improve their cybersecurity:

1. Regularly monitor network activity and investigate any suspicious activity.

2. Use anti-virus and anti-malware software on all devices, including mobile devices.

3. Limit the number of employees who have access to sensitive data and systems.

4. Require strong passwords that are changed regularly.

5. Use encryption to protect sensitive data both in transit and at rest.

6. Implement network access controls to restrict access to sensitive data and systems.

7. Use cloud-based services from reputable providers that have strong security and privacy policies in place.

8. Regularly perform security risk assessments to identify vulnerabilities and implement appropriate controls.

9. Enforce a strict bring-your-own-device (BYOD) policy that requires the use of secure devices and software.

10. Have a cyber incident response plan in place to respond to security incidents and minimize damage.
